title: X Novel I & II - Game Music Pack - Visual Novel, Anime, Orchestral, Electronic
description: Made exclusively for Visual Novels and Fantasy games, X Novel I & II is a Game Music pack that brings life to your games.
longDescription:
From normal students who want to become heroes, to mysterious teachers that seem to know more of what they shouldn’t know. X Novel I & II is made for those stories that we all love.


Listen to the Soundtrack Packs here:

X Novel I

X Novel II


What’s inside:

X Novel I

– 12 original high-quality music

– 16 original high-quality music loops

– 28 total files

- Unlimited Royalty-Free License


X Novel II

– 9 original high-quality music

– 9 original high-quality music loops

– 18 total files

- Unlimited Royalty-Free License



Tracklist:

X Novel I

01 - Roll the Sequence (Main Theme)

02 - Roll the Sequence (Main Theme) (alt version)

03 - A Hero in a Normal City

04 - Little Time Left

05 - Long Day Isn't it

06 - Long Day Isn't it (Alt Version)

07 - Conflict 08 - Anxiety Around

09 - Anxiety Around (Alt Version)

10 - Incident

11 - Goodbye My Friend

12 - Goodbye My Friend (Piano Only)



X Novel II

(00:00) - 01 - Main Theme

(00:30) - 02 - Out Of Context

(01:00) - 03 - Uncertain Tomorrow

(01:30) - 04 - Manipulation

(02:00) - 05 - Mass Fear

(02:30) - 06 - Benedict

(03:00) - 07 - Arien Theme

(03:30) - 08 - Banat

(04:00) - 09 - Benedict (Piano Version)



(All file formats are in WAV, Stereo, 44.8kHz, 32bit)


With these game music/soundtrack packs, you also:

– Sounds great in any device: All music themes and stingers are fully mixed and mastered for seamless playback on any device.

– Avoid incongruent volumes: All themes and stingers are mastered for consistent volume throughout the soundtrack.

– Repeat music seamlessly: All music themes are fully loop-able, allowing for uninterrupted gameplay.


About composer:


Lufus is a music producer and composer known for creating the Original Soundtracks for multi-million downloaded games, including:




Support & help:


If you need help downloading these soundtrack/music packs, feel free to reach out to iamlufus@gmail.com
